<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Unshakable Idealism](/Feats.aspx?ID=1093) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 94 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Knight Vigilant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=27)

**Prerequisites**
[Knight Vigilant](/Feats.aspx?ID=1092); expert in Will saves

</column>

---

Your faith and hope can’t be shaken, and you won’t flee when lives are at stake. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on saves against [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effects and [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) effects that inflict despair. When you would gain the [fleeing](/Conditions.aspx?ID=17) condition, you can choose to stand your ground and be [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) for the effect’s duration as well, preventing you from running and allowing you to re-enter the fight more quickly when the effect ends.
name: Unshakable Idealism
prerequisite: Knight Vigilant; expert in Will saves
